channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Top NASA Official Is Among Thousands of Staff Leaving the Agency
item.description: Makenzie Lystrup’s departure from NASA’s Goddard Space Flight Center comes soon after the resignation of the director of JPL.

item.title: PayPal taps wallets from China and India to make cross-border payments easier for 2 billion people
item.description: PayPal is partnering with global fintech companies to let users pay to different wallet systems cross border.

item.title: OpenAI agreed to pay Oracle $30B a year for data center services
item.description: OpenAI was the customer that signed the huge deal that Oracle disclosed last month.

item.title: The 47 Best Shows on Hulu Right Now (August 2025)
item.description: Washington Black, It’s Always Sunny in Philadelphia, and The Bear are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Hulu this month.

item.title: Amazon acquires Bee, the AI wearable that records everything you say
item.description: Amazon has acquired the AI wearables startup Bee, which makes a bracelet and an Apple Watch app that record your day-to-day life to function as an AI ...

item.title: Rocket Lab’s first hurdle to flying its new rocket is getting it to the pad
item.description: Rocket Lab is asking regulators to approve a temporary method to transport hardware to its new spaceport.

item.title: Everything Is a ‘False Flag’ Now
item.description: Conspiracy theories about so-called false-flag attacks have been around for decades. But as trust in media and public institutions craters, every sing...

item.title: Apple alerted Iranians to iPhone spyware attacks, say researchers
item.description: Researchers say Apple sent out threat notifications to several Iranians in recent months, saying their iPhones had been hacked. Iran is likely behind ...

item.title: A Surprise Pokémon Game Just Dropped for Switch and Mobile
item.description: Pokémon Friends, available now, is a daily puzzle game that lets players untangle yarn to make prizes.

item.title: OpenAI Seeks Additional Capital From Investors as Part of Its $40 Billion Round
item.description: OpenAI, which recently announced a $40 billion round of financing, is seeking funding from new and existing investors to fulfill the deal.
